Enemy - Class in <Unnamed>
Describes an enemy in general terms additional instance variable myDamage because it doesn't have a weapon like a player does has nearPlayer() method to see if it's within it's prey's bubble attack() throws punches as long as its a certain distance from the dude subclasses basic, medium, and hard enemies

P

PhysicsBox - Class in <Unnamed>
class PhysicsBox - controls the system of gravity and interaction of the blocks and fighters, so the fighters can interact with the blocks like platforms and all fighters are affected by gravity

constructor PhysicsBox - creates a physics system default to no fighters or blocks
PhysicsBox(List<Fighter>, List<Block>) - Constructor for class PhysicsBox
constructor PhysicsBox - creates a physics system with the specified list of fighters and blocks
